labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/r-ver
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Reproducible builds to fixed version of R
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/library/ubuntu:focal

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/rstudio
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: RStudio Server with fixed version of R
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/r-ver:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/tidyverse
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Version-stable build of R, RStudio Server, and R packages.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/rstudio:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/verse
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Adds tex & related publishing packages to version-locked tidyverse image.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/tidyverse:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/geospatial
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Docker-based Geospatial toolkit for R, built on versioned Rocker image.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/verse:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/shiny
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Shiny Server on versioned Rocker image.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/r-ver:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/shiny-verse
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Rocker Shiny image + Tidyverse R packages. Uses version-stable image.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/shiny:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/binder
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Adds Jupyter to rocker/geospatial. RStudio Server can be started from Jupyter.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/geospatial:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/cuda
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: NVIDIA CUDA libraries added to Rocker image.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/r-ver:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/ml
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Docker image with R + GPU support for machine learning libraries.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/cuda:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.title: rocker/ml-verse
labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Docker image with R + GPU support for machine learning libraries, and many R packages.
labels.org.opencontainers.image.base.name: docker.io/rocker/ml:4.1.0

labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Docker image with R + GPU support for machine learning libraries.

labels.org.opencontainers.image.description: Docker image with R + GPU support for machine learning libraries, and many R packages.
